schema.description: Note: This form is for registration at the Marietta location. If you need to register for the Cumming location, please go here.
schema.title: 2018-19 Marietta Bala Vihar Registration Form

payment_method.title: Please select a Payment Method.
enumNames: Pay now with PayPal ($10 convenience fee)

returning_family.title: Was your family part of Chinmaya Mission Alpharetta (either SFMS or Marietta Locations) in 2017-2018?

accept_terms.title: Please Note: Terms and Conditions
accept_terms.description:
You will receive our weekly newsletter and teacher communication at the email address you have given.

One Parent or Guardian should be in Bala Vihar Premises during the Bala Vihar class hours.

If you need to change your cell phone, email address, etc. in the future, you can do so by logging in on this website.

I agree with the terms above.

donation.title: Would you like to do a one time donation of $2,000 for this year in lieu of the annual fee?
donation.description:
This includes:
  • CMA family membership for one year, including Bala Vihar fees
  • Complimentary tickets to fund-raising events benefiting CMA for one year
enumNames: Yes, I will donate $2,000 in lieu of fees this year.
No, I will just pay the regular family fee.

subscribe.title: I would like to be informed about future Chinmaya Mission events by email.
subscribe.description: I would like to be informed by email about future events from Chinmaya Mission.

volunteer.title: Would you like to volunteer at CMA Marietta? If so, how?
